document.docTitle: Magellanoconnus (Magellanoconnus) paranodicornis Jałoszyński & Newton 2017, comb. n.
document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomy of ' Euconnus complex'. Part XV. Disentangling the Euconnus - Sciacharis knot (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Scydmaeninae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Taxonomy of ' Euconnus complex'. Part XV. Disentangling the Euconnus - Sciacharis knot (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Scydmaeninae)

.

by Franz (1993a , 1997 ).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Sciacharis ( Magellanoconnus ) wynbergianus (Franz)
; implied new comb. in Franz, 1980a : 262 and as a result of reinstating
Magellanoconnus
as subgenus of
Sciacharis
by Franz (1993a , 1997 ).
Magellanoconnus wynbergianus (Franz)
; implied new comb. in Kuschel, 1990 : 76.
